üêû Bug Fixes

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.47.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat(tables): introduce the future of no-code automation database (#6597) @amrdb

üß© Pieces

  • fix(dust): update Dust error format after API change (#7089) @AdamSelene
  • fix: support duplicate query params for arrays (#7072) @danielpoonwj
  • feat(slack): new command trigger and get file action (#7080) @geekyme
  • feat: add Metabase get dashboard questions action (#7068) @valentin-mourtialon

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: check if jwt expired in current user (#7099) @abuaboud
  • fix: progress bar value usage limits (#7091) @hazemadelkhalel

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: allow to manual override notify status for embed users (#7096) @abuaboud
  • fix: remove icons from sidebar and show docs flag (#7090) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: make some improvements to the sidebar styling (#7083) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: allow deleting single tables + introduce actions menu in /tables route (#7086) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add danielpoonwj as a contributor for code (#7084) @allcontributors

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @amrdb, @danielpoonwj, @geekyme, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr and @valentin-mourtialon

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.47.1
entry.content:
üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@abuaboud and @snyk-bot
